Events that occurred on 9 September.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1922 - Tolkien's favourite artist, Pauline Baynes, is born.
1943 - Renowned scholar Tom Shippey is born.
1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 149.
1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to the Rector of the University of Li√®ge.
2016 - Oxonmoot 2016 at St Antony's College.
2022 - The episode Adar of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power is released online.
2023 - Actor Peter McKenzie dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
